snippet: Mike Maker, who led Williams College to the Division III national championship game last season for the second time in five years, was hired as the men’s basketball coach at Marist College.
abstract: Mike Maker, who led Williams College to two Division III national championship games, is hired as men's basketball coach at Marist College.
lead_paragraph: Mike Maker, who led Williams College to the Division III national championship game last season for the second time in five years, was hired as the men’s basketball coach at Marist College.

headline.main: Marist Hires Williams College’s Basketball Coach
